articles.author: TOI Science Desk
articles.title: Spanish scientist finds cure for pancreatic cancer in major medical breakthrough - Times of India
articles.description: Science News: A Spanish research team says it has developed a treatment that completely eliminated the most aggressive form of pancreatic cancer in laboratory mice,.

articles.author: Nur Hikmah Md Ali
articles.title: CNBC Daily Open: The EU-India trade deal story is not over yet - CNBC
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump has yet to air his views about the India-EU agreement.
articles.content:
On Tuesday, India and the European Union announced a "landmark" free trade deal that would remove or reduce tariffs on more than 90% of goods traded between them.
